00022 #ifndef _CELTransformer_HEADER_
00023 #define _CELTransformer_HEADER_

00025 #include <string>
00026 #include <map>
00027 #include <vector>
00028 #include <list>
00029 #include "chipstream/ChipStream.h"
00030 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00031 
00032 namespace affx
00033 {
00034 
00035 /*! Program to generically transform cel file data using
00036  * chipstreams and write the data to a new cel file. Also serves as relatively simple
00037  * code sample to illustrate usage of chipstream code.
00038  */
00039 class CELTransformerEngine : public BaseEngine
00040 {
00041 private:
00042         
00043         std::vector<std::string> celFiles;
00044 
00045         /*! Define all options. */
00046         void defineOptions();
00047 
00048         /*! Run the workflow to compute the phenotypes */
00049         void runImp();
00050 
00051         /*! Check the options. */
00052         void checkOptionsImp();
00053 
00054         void transformOld(int celIx, std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStreamVec);
00055         void transformNew(int celIx, std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStreamVec);
00056 
00057 public:
00058         
00059         /*! Get the engine name */
00060         virtual std::string getEngineName() { return CELTransformerEngine::EngineName(); }
00061 
00062         /*! Get the engine name */
00063         static const std::string EngineName() { return "CELTransformerEngine"; }
00064 
00065         /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00066         class Reg : public EngineReg
00067         {
00068         public:
00069                 /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00070                 Reg() : EngineReg(CELTransformerEngine::EngineName())
00071                 {
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 /*! Creates an object.
00075                  * @return The object.
00076                  */
00077                 BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new CELTransformerEngine; }
00078         };
00079 
00080         /*! The one and only registration object. */
00081         static Reg reg;
00082 
00083         /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00084          * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00085          * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00086          */
00087         static CELTransformerEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
00088 
00089         /*! Constructor */
00090         CELTransformerEngine();
00091 
00092         /*! Destructor */
00093         ~CELTransformerEngine();
00094 };
00095 
00096 }
